full_text:
The #nflverse games data has been updated with the full 2022 regular season schedule.

It is now used by default in @nflseedR (no need to update the package).

Who says coding in R can't be beautiful?? AFC West schedules, brought to you by #ggplot2, #RStats, and the #nflverse. 

Time zones (shown at bottom) are the time zones of the team location. https://t.co/nC7o9l9G3f
